commit.message:
Turn off pre-commit's automated multiprocessing

Since the doc8 output includes a summary footer, this appears multiple times if pre-commit has run multiple copies of doc8 in parallel.

verification.payload:
tree 9ae5c9a1b024c3e356aff13db59bae7812b5177e
parent ce90d48aa6042231c1af3bff930003560ec27b51
author Peter Cock <p.j.a.cock@googlemail.com> 1597453230 +0100
committer GitHub <noreply@github.com> 1597453230 +0100

Turn off pre-commit's automated multiprocessing

Since the doc8 output includes a summary footer, this appears multiple times if pre-commit has run multiple copies of doc8 in parallel.

commit.message:
README: Further tweaks

- Use more standard header characters
- Move Python invocation to a separate section
- Correct capitalization of doc8
